v: In order to go to the store and view the product catalog, select the city to which delivery is needed from the list of available ones.
sliderText: Magic is in each of us
newsletterText: Inspiring content, tips and discounts in your inbox. Subscribe to our newsletter - do not miss the opportunity to receive additional discounts.
newsletterAfter: By subscribing to our newsletter, you agree to our terms
newsletterError2: The E-mail is not correctly filled in
newsletterError3: You have already subscribed to the newsletter
newsletterSuccess: You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter
orSoc: or log in as a user
errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
textEmpty: The list of products is empty
textEmptyFilter: Nothing was found according to the specified parameters
forgottenText: Enter your E-mail under which you are registered on the site. Click the send button to get the password by email.
forgottenSuccess: A letter with instructions has been sent to the specified email
accountTextWishlistEmpty: Products have not been added to favorites yet
networkNull: Something went wrong, try again later
ordersEmpty: You don't have any orders yet
shareText: Share this product on social networks or with friends
cartEmpty: Products have not been added to the cart yet
infCur: Instructions to the florist or courier
textCoupon: I have a discount/gift card code
notAddress: I don't know the address, please check with the recipient
textSp: Pay attention! We do not inform the recipient who ordered the delivery. You can specify who the delivery is from in the text of the postcard.
chaiPzl: You can leave a tip to the florist
continueCheck: By continuing to place an order, you agree to our rules, which are described in the section
errorCoupon: Error. Incorrect discount Coupon code. The expiration date may have expired or the usage limit has been reached!
couponSuccess: The promo code has been successfully applied
errorWarning2: You must accept the terms of the agreement
orderPaySuccess: The order has been successfully paid
